Trigger.Name: Raven Dive -> Lunar Dynamo
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 00:0044:From on high I descend, in blessed light to bask!

Trigger.Name: Raven Dive -> Iron Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 00:0044:From on high I descend, mine enemies to smite!

Trigger.Name: Thermionic Beam -> Lunar Dynamo
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 00:0044:O refulgent moon, shine down your light!

Trigger.Name: Thermionic Beam -> Iron Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 00:0044:Blazing path, lead me to conquest!

Trigger.Name: Lunar Dynamo -> Thermionic Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 00:0044:O red moon, scorch mine enemies!

Trigger.Name: Lunar Dynamo -> Iron Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 00:0044:O red moon, shine the path to conquest!

Trigger.Name: Dalamud Dive -> Thermionic Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 00:0044:Fleeting light, score the earth with a firey kiss!

Trigger.Name: Meteor Stream -> Dalamud Dive
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 00:0044:Fleeting light, outshine the stars for the moon!

Trigger.Name: Fellruin Trio: Raven Dive -> Lunar Dynamo -> Meteor Stream
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 00:0044:From on high I descend, a hail of stars to bring!

Trigger.Name: Fellruin Trio: Lunar Dynamo -> Raven Dive -> Meteor Stream
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 00:0044:From red moon I descend, a hail of stars to bring!

Trigger.Name: Bahamut's Favor: Iron Chariot -> Raven Dive -> Thermionic Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 00:0044:Gleaming steel, plunge and take firey edge!

Trigger.Name: Bahamut's Favor: Lunar Dynamo -> Iron Chariot -> Raven Dive
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 00:0044:From red moon I draw steel, in my descent to bare!

Trigger.Name: Bahamut's Favor: Lunar Dynamo -> Raven Dive -> Thermionic Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 00:0044:From red moon I descend, upon burning earth to tread!

Trigger.Name: Bahamut's Favor: Iron Chariot -> Thermionic Beam -> Raven Dive
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 00:0044:Gleaming steel, take fire and descend!

Trigger.Name: Marked by Deathstorm (Doom)
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[a-zA-Z'\- ]+) gains the effect of Doom from for (?<time>\d+)

Trigger.Name: Marked for Chain Lightning
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<target>[a-zA-Z'\- ]+) gains the effect of Thunderstruck from for (?<time>\d+)

Trigger.Name: Activate Auras
Trigger.RegularExpression: Bahamut Prime uses Grand Octet.

Trigger.Name: Morn Afah
Trigger.RegularExpression: Bahamut Prime readies Morn Afah

Trigger.Name: Twister
Trigger.RegularExpression: Twintania readies Twister.
